analysis.description:
PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_deposits (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#62-81) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! receiver.send(50000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#72-73)

PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_claims (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#84-106) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! receiver.send(refund_amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#96)
PPBC_Ether_Claim.end_redeem_period (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#106-111) allows anyone to destruct the contract

PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_deposits has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! receiver.send(50000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#72-73)

PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_claims has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! receiver.send(refund_amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0xaa93338ef3b64a50dcfb2eba57a1eb4ad59d955b.sol#96)
